urls.description: On February 11, 2020, clients of ePayments (payment system) received messages that their accounts were temporarily frozen, and the following message appeared on the home page of www.epayments.com: The main problem ‚Äì NO ONE TALKS ABOUT TIME FRAMES! Clients have been patiently waiting for alm ost half a year! But the support team of ePayments doesn‚Äô t say anything particular. Besides, the FCA (Financial Conduct Authority) doesn‚Äô t set any deadlines for ePayments to solve their issues in accordance with
